name: Wolverine
description:
21th work of art from the collection of pigs
The pig is a symbol of wealth and fertility, so I chose the pig to represent this collection (in the first step). In this collection, I have portrayed pigs in the form of characters, each representing a specific person, cortex and symbol of a specific concept, in order to use these symbols and concepts to modern human life.
Road map:
These works are performed in 100 works; which are in 10 part of 10 piece, which deal with negative and positive human behaviors and personalities. In each of the 10 works, I considered two good give away. Before uploading the works, I will provide the necessary explanations and information about the give away.
In the third collection (10-part), we go to the comic superheroes.
In this series of 10, I will have two give away.
I will announce the second give away on Twitter after uploading the 25th work
